Adventurer Helper:
Excellent. Now to review the mission....
Kill *Grave Scarabs*, *Scavanger Scarabs, Grave* *Ants, Scavanger Ants, Shrine Hnights, and Shrine* *Guards* in the Shrine of Loyalty until you have collected *77 Traces of Evil*. Then report back to *Priest Bastian* in the *Town of Goddard*. He will take the samples and pay you for your time.
